text: The 1947 Clemson Tigers baseball team represented Clemson University in the 1947 NCAA baseball season. The team played their home games at Riggs Field in Clemson, South Carolina. The team was coached by Randy Hinson, who completed his fourth season at Clemson. The Tigers were invited to the first NCAA Baseball Tournament, where they fell to Yale in the first game in the history of the event.
